definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable id="item" name="DO0"><block type="spawn_gem"><field name="despawn">TRUE</field><value name="block"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:RustShard</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">10</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
